titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make certain corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 4174.
Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make certain corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 4174.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Mr. Mitchell moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Con. Res. 149.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 362 - 12 (Roll no. 483).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 4174 (Foundations for Evidence-Based Policymaking Act of 2018).
